name: Mohammed Alzafarani

projects.title: Momentum
projects.description: Momentum is a habit tracker application that lets a user add habits, denote habit events when a habit is done as planned, and lets the user share to others their current habit progress.

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: A University of Alberta graduate in a Computer Science and Mathematics major with 4 years of experience in web and mobile development. Strong skills in front-end and back-end development, proficient in Javascript, HTML, CSS, C, strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, and web/mobile development principles, and passion for staying current with industry trends.

resume.description: University of Alberta graduate in a Computer Science and Mathematics major with 4 years of experience in web and mobile development. Strong skills in front-end and back-end development, proficient in Javascript, HTML, CSS, C, strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, and web/mobile development principles, and passion for staying current with industry trends.

experiences.position: Frontend Developer at University of Alberta
experiences.bullets: Collaborated with a team to develop and launch an open-source project for student use and contribution, Led the requirement gathering/analysis/design/estimation/testing of the frontend using Selenium resulting in the successful development and implementation of a user-friendly and visually appealing interface, Optimized the resume parsing algorithm to efficiently read JSON files reducing data processing time by 50%, Published a student resume Python package on GitHub which provided students with an efficient way to generate professional resumes
